title: Frequency of internet use in Spain 2017
summary: The Once_a_week_(including_every_day) Duration internet is currently the most represented in Spain with 80 use , followed by Daily with 69 and At_least_once_a_week_(but_not_every_day) with 11 .
Less_than_once_a_week brought up the rear with 5 individuals .
Drugstores were the most common shopping locations for consumers buying cosmetics and body care products .

data.Duration: At least once a week (but not every day)

gold: This statistic shows the percentage of individuals using the internet by frequency in Spain in 2017 . In 2017 , 69 percent of individuals in Spain accessed the internet daily or more frequently .
